select t1.id as id , t1.ChimerDB_Type as ChimerDB_Type , t1.Fusion_pair as Fusion_pair , substring(t1.Translocation,1,length(rtrim(t1.Translocation))-1) as Translocation , t1.H_gene as H_gene , t1.T_gene as T_gene , t1.PMID as PMID , t1.Score as Score , REPLACE(t1.Disease, ';', ', ') as Disease , t1.Validation as Validation , t1.Kinase as Kinase , t1.Oncogene as Oncogene , t1.Tumor_suppressor as Tumor_suppressor , t1.Receptor as Receptor , t1.Transcription_Factor as Transcription_Factor , t1.ChimerKB as ChimerKB , t1.ChimerSeq as ChimerSeq , t1.Sentence_highlight as Sentence_highlight , t1.H_gene_highlight as H_gene_highlight , t1.T_gene_highlight as T_gene_highlight , t1.Disease_highlight as Disease_highlight , t1.Validation_highlight as Validation_highlight , t2.num_pub as num_pub from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub t1
,( select H_gene, count(H_gene) as num_pub from (select distinct H_gene, PMID from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub) it1 group by it1.H_gene ) t2
,( select T_gene, count(T_gene) as num_pub from (select distinct T_gene, PMID from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub) it1 group by it1.T_gene ) t2
,( select gene, count(gene) as num_pub from (select distinct H_gene as gene, PMID from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub union select distinct T_gene as gene, PMID from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub) it1 group by it1.gene ) t2
,( select Fusion_pair, count(Fusion_pair) as num_pub from (select distinct Fusion_pair, PMID from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub) it1 group by it1.Fusion_pair ) t2
,( select Disease, count(Disease) as num_pub from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub group by Disease ) t2
,( select 100 as num_pub ) t2
where 1=1
and t1.H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" and t2.H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and t1.T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" and t2.T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and ( t1.H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" and t2.gene = "${dataForSearchType}" ) or ( t1.T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" and t2.gene = "${dataForSearchType}" )
and t1.Fusion_pair = "${dataForSearchType}" and t2.Fusion_pair = "${dataForSearchType}"
and t1.Disease like "%${dataForSearchType}%" and t2.Disease like "%${dataForSearchType}%"
and (t1.H_locus like "${dataForSearchType}%" or t1.T_locus like "${dataForSearchType}%")
and t2.num_pub >= ${numOfPub} and t1.Score >= ${txtMiningScore} and t1.Validation in (${queryForValidationMtd}) and (${queryForFilterByFunc}) and (${queryForSupInfo}) ORDER BY t1.Translocation DESC, t1.fusion_pair;

select t1.id as id , t1.ChimerDB_Type as ChimerDB_Type , t1.Fusion_pair as Fusion_pair , substring(t1.Translocation,1,length(rtrim(t1.Translocation))-1) as Translocation , t1.H_gene as H_gene , t1.T_gene as T_gene , t1.PMID as PMID , t1.Score as Score , t1.Disease as Disease , t1.Validation as Validation , t1.Kinase as Kinase , t1.Oncogene as Oncogene , t1.Tumor_suppressor as Tumor_suppressor , t1.Receptor as Receptor , t1.Transcription_Factor as Transcription_Factor , t1.ChimerKB as ChimerKB , t1.ChimerSeq as ChimerSeq , t1.Sentence_highlight as Sentence_highlight , t1.H_gene_highlight as H_gene_highlight , t1.T_gene_highlight as T_gene_highlight , t1.Disease_highlight as Disease_highlight , t1.Validation_highlight as Validation_highlight from ChimerDB3.ChimerPub t1 where 1=1
and t1.Fusion_pair = "${Fusion_pair}" and t1.Disease like "%${Disease}%" and t1.PMID = "${PMID}" and t1.H_gene = "${H_gene}" and t1.T_gene = "${T_gene}" limit 1;
SELECT score, COUNT(PMID) AS frequency FROM ( SELECT MAX(Score) AS Score , PMID FROM ChimerPub GROUP BY PMID ) maxPub GROUP BY maxPub.Score ORDER BY CONVERT(Score, decimal)
